title: Token
description: A cryptographic token used to prove control of an the email address. Used for either email verification or password reset.

tokenType.description: The type of token, 'verification' or 'reset', used for email verification or password reset, respectively.
tokenType.title: Token type

expiry.description: The date time the token should expire.
expiry.title: Expiration time

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user to which this token applies.
